messages.message:
A few more thoughts on local dev v docker dev. There is space for both styles at Instabase. Ideally, docker is a more correct approach since we run production-grade Instabase on docker containers. This allows us to dogfood locally what we deliver to customers. But, I also understand the frustration due to development slowness that can be introduced by docker.
.
If anyone will like to introduce minikube and use docker for local development. You are more than welcome to do so.
